TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RoleManagerSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class RoleManagerSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 定义用于支持 Web 应用程序的角色管理基础结构的配置设置。

span.span: Defines configuration settings that are used to support the role management infrastructure of Web applications.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的节内容的方式 `roleManager` 。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the `roleManager` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何以声明方式指定类的多个属性的值 。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二个示例演示如何使用 类型。The second demonstrates how to use the type. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式指定类的多个属性的值 。The following configuration file example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#1)]

span.span: Understanding Role Management

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例 。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. 下表显示了用于构造函数的默认设置 。The following table shows the default settings that are used for the constructor. |propertiesProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||"..ASPXROLES".ASPXROLES"| ||"/""/"| ||`All`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||30，分钟30, in minutes| ||`false`| ||"AspNetSqlRoleProvider""AspNetSqlRoleProvider"| ||空字符串 ( "" ) An empty string ("")| ||2525|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CacheRolesInCookie { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CacheRolesInCookie : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前用户的角色是否已缓存在某个 Cookie 中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current user's roles are cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果当前用户的角色已缓存在某个 Cookie 中，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the current user's roles are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否启用角色名称的 cookie 存储。The property returns a Boolean value indicating whether cookie storage for role names is enabled. 在 配置文件中将属性设置为时 `true` ，每个用户的角色信息将存储在客户端的 cookie 中。When the property is set to `true` in the configuration file, role information for each user is stored in a cookie on the client. 当角色管理检查以确定用户是否属于特定角色时，将检查角色 cookie，然后调用角色提供程序来检查数据源中的角色列表。When role management checks to determine whether a user is in a particular role, the roles cookie is checked before calling the role provider to check the list of roles at the data source. Cookie 在客户端上动态更新，以缓存最近验证的角色名称。The cookie is dynamically updated on the client to cache the most recently validated role names. 你可以通过在配置 配置文件的部分时指定属性来提高 cookie 中缓存的角色名称的可靠性 `roleManager` 。You can improve the reliability of the role names that are cached in a cookie by specifying a property when you configure the `roleManager` section of the configuration file. 默认 属性为 `All` ，它将加密 cookie 中的角色名称并验证 cookie 内容是否未被更改。The default property is `All`, which encrypts role names in the cookie and validates that the cookie contents have not been altered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookieName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CookieName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的名称。

span.span: The name of the cookie used to cache role names.

value.span: 默认值是“.ASPXROLES”。

span.span: The default is ".ASPXROLES".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回用于缓存角色名称的 cookie 的名称。The property returns the name of the cookie that is used to cache role names. 可以通过设置 `cookieName` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性，指定用于为应用程序缓存角色的 cookie 的名称。You can specify the name of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieName` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 当你希望唯一标识应用程序的 cookie 或在多个应用程序之间共享 cookie 时，此方法非常有用。This is useful when you want to uniquely identify a cookie for your application or when a cookie is shared across multiple applications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CookiePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CookiePath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的虚拟路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path of the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 用于存储角色名称的 Cookie 的路径。

span.span: The path of the cookie used to store role names.

value.span: 默认值是“/”。

span.span: The default is "/".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过在 `cookiePath` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中设置属性，来指定为应用程序缓存角色名称的 cookie 的路径。You can specify the path of the cookie where role names are cached for your application by setting the `cookiePath` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 属性 `cookiePath` 从 Web.config 文件返回特性的值。The property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file. 该路径区分大小写。The path is case sensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Security::CookieProtection CookieProtection { System::Web::Security::CookieProtection get(); void set(System::Web::Security::CookieProtection value); };
member this.CookieProtection : System.Web.Security.CookieProtection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于保护缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的安全类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of security that is used to protect the cookie that caches role names.

value.span: 在缓存角色名称的 Cookie 中使用的安全保护类型。

span.span: The type of security protection used within the cookie where role names are cached.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性介绍如何安全地存储 cookie 中的信息。The property describes how information in a cookie is securely stored. 可以通过设置 `cookieProtection` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性，指定用于为应用程序缓存角色的 cookie 的安全类型。You can specify the security type of the cookie where roles are cached for your application by setting the `cookieProtection` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. `cookieProtection`特性采用 `All` 、、或的枚举值 `Encryption` `None` `Validation` 。The `cookieProtection` attribute takes a enumeration value of `All`, `Encryption`, `None`, or `Validation`. 默认值为 `All`。The default is `All`. 如果需要数据验证和加密来帮助保护 cookie，请确保使用属性的默认值。Be sure to use the default value for the property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie. 若要改善对 cookie 的保护，还可以将属性设置 为 `true` 。To improve the protection of your cookie, you can also set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieRequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieRequireSSL : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 是否需要一个安全套接字层 (SSL) 连接才能被返回到服务器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cookie that is used to cache role names requires a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection in order to be returned to the server.

value.span: 如果需要一个 SSL 连接才能将缓存角色名称的 Cookie 返回到服务器，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is needed in order to return to the server the cookie where role names are cached; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过在 `cookieRequireSSL` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中设置属性，可以指定是否需要 SSL 将角色名称 cookie 返回到服务器。You can specify whether SSL is required to return the role names cookie to the server by setting the `cookieRequireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieSlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieSlidingExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否定期重置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cookie that is used to cache role names will be reset periodically.

value.span: 如果将要定期重置角色名称 Cookie 的到期日期和时间，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the role names cookie expiration date and time will be reset periodically; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用 `cookieSlidingExpiration` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的属性，指定用于缓存角色名称的 cookie 是否定期重置或过期。You can specify whether the cookie that is used to cache role names is periodically reset or expired at a fixed point in time by using the `cookieSlidingExpiration` attribute in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如果 `true` 为，则 cookie 过期最初设置为当前日期和时间加上 属性，以分钟为单位。If `true`, the cookie expiration is initially set to the current date and time plus the property, in minutes. 当用户继续主动使用 ASP.NET 应用程序时，如果剩余的不到一半，cookie 的到期日期和时间会自动刷新 。While the user continues to actively use the ASP.NET application, the expiration date and time of the cookie is automatically refreshed, if there is less than half of the remaining. 默认值为 `true`。The default is `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#7)]

member this.CookieTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 过期之前的分钟数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of minutes before the cookie that is used to cache role names expires.

value.span: ，这是用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 过期之前的分钟数。

span.span: A that is the number of minutes before the cookie used to cache role names expires.

value.span: 默认值为 30（以分钟为单位）。

span.span: The default is 30, in minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置一个值，该值指定角色名称 cookie 过期之前的分钟数。The property sets a value specifying the number of minutes before the role names cookie expires. 默认值为 30 分钟。The default is 30 minutes. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则 忽略属性。If the property is `false`, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#8)]

member this.CreatePersistentCookie : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示是使用基于会话的 Cookie 还是使用持久性 Cookie 来缓存角色名称。

span.span: Indicates whether a session-based cookie or a persistent cookie is used to cache role names.

value.span: 若要使角色名称 Cookie 在浏览器会话之间得到保持，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: to make the role names cookie persistent across browser sessions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示用于缓存角色名称的 cookie 是否应为基于会话的 cookie，这意味着关闭浏览器时 cookie 会丢失，或者是持久性 cookie，这意味着 cookie 可在浏览器会话中使用。The property indicates whether or not the cookie that is used to cache role names should be a session-based cookie, which means that the cookie is lost when the browser is closed, or a persistent cookie, which means that the cookie is available across browser sessions. 默认值为 `false` ，表示使用基于会话的 cookie 来缓存角色名称。The default is `false`, which indicates that a session-based cookie is used to cache role names. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets or sets the name of the default provider that is used to manage roles.

value.span: 中的提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of a provider in the .

value.span: 默认值是“AspNetSqlRoleProvider”。

span.span: The default is "AspNetSqlRoleProvider".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须与配置文件的节的子节中的命名值匹配 `providers` `roleManager` 。The property must match a named value in the `providers` subsection of the `roleManager` section of a configuration file. 空字符串 ( "" ) 不是属性的有效值 。An empty string ("") is not a valid value for the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置与用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 关联的域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the domain that is associated with the cookie that is used to cache role names.

value.span: 用于缓存角色名称的 Cookie 的 。

span.span: The of the cookie used to cache role names.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ()。

span.span: The default is an empty string ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用配置元素的特性在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置中设置属性 `domain` `roleManager` 。The property is set in the configuration for an ASP.NET application by using the `domain` attribute of the `roleManager` configuration element. 如果特性的配置中未指定任何值 `domain` ，则属性将 返回 `null` ，并且角色名称 cookie 域默认为属性的行为 。If no value is specified in the configuration for the `domain` attribute, the property returns `null` and the role names cookie domain defaults to the behavior of the property. 默认值为一个空字符串。The default is an empty string.

summary.span: 获取 元素的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色管理提供程序是为站点提供访问角色类型的组件。Role management providers are components that provide access to the types of roles for a site. 您可以在配置文件的节的子节中指定角色管理提供程序 `providers` `roleManager` 。You can specify role management providers in the `providers` subsection of the `roleManager` section of a configuration file. 属性指定默认情况下使用的提供程序。The property specifies the provider that is used by default. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/CS/rolemanagersection.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.RoleManagerSection/VB/rolemanagersection.vb#13)]
